definitions.text: music intended to be performed by one or more singers, usually with instrumental accompaniment
a short musical composition with words
examples: a successful musical must have at least three good songs

definitions.text: relating to or designed for or using the singing voice
examples: organized a vocal group to sing his compositions

definitions.text: having or using the power to produce speech or sound
examples: all vocal beings hymned their praise

definitions.text: given to expressing yourself freely or insistently
examples: outspoken in their opposition to segregation

definitions.text: full of the sound of voices
examples: a playground vocal with the shouts and laughter of children
